1b1(sngags): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA la shri a d+hiSh+Ta wa ti sa ta na ma/ 
1b2(sngags): bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po byin brlabs can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes 
1b3(sngags): bya ba/ myur mdzad mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// dam 
1b4(sngags): pa'i chos tshul bzhin sgrub pa'i sgrub pa po chen pos mi dang mi ma yin pa gnod pa 
1b5(sngags): rab kyis dge ba'i bar du gcod pa byung na// dge sbyong nyid kyi bar chad gsal 
2a1(sngags): ba'i phyir/ dpal mgon po nag po'i sgrub thabs 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas dben pa bzad 
2b1(sngags): ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa'i ngang las rang yi dam ye shes lha'i bskyed rim gzhung bzhin bya/ de'i snyen sngags ci rigs par bzlas nas/ rang gi snying kha'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas/ bgegs kyi rgyal po 
2b2(sngags): log 'dren bkug pa'i steng du/ paM yig las pad ma 'dab brgyad bsam/ de'i lte b.rar dmar po las nyi ma'i gdan bsams te/ rang gi snying kha'i 'od zer gyis lho phyogs kyi dur khrod tsan dan gyi shing kha nas dpal 
2b3(sngags): ye shes kyi mgon po nag po chen po spyan drangs nas nam mkha' na tshur byon te/ gdan thog tu bzhugs par bsams la/ nges par 'byon zhing bzhugs nas bdag la byin gyis brlob par 'gyur ro// de la yid mches 
2b4(sngags): na rang lhag pa'i ltar bsgoms nas snying kha'i sa bon las 'od 'bros pas gdan skyed pa snga ma bzhin byas/ gdan thog tu yi ge b+h+rUM mthing nag bsam/ de las 'od 'phros 'dus rdo rje gri guge hUM gis mtshan pa bsam 
2b5(sngags): degyur pa las nag po chen po bskyed de/ khro bo'i gzugs brnyan sku mdog mab nag 'od 'bar brgyud nas gsungs pa bzhin zhal gsum par sgom mo// dbus zhal su mdog dang 'thun pa/ zhal g.yas dmar nag/ 
2b6(sngags): g.yon pa ldang nag tu'o// sngon du mthong ba bzhin zhal gcig mthing nag tu skom/ gang ltar du sgom yang phyag drug pa kho na ste/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po mi mgo'i phreng ba 'grang ba/ gnyis pa na gri gug/ gsum pa 
2b7(sngags): na Da ma ru 'khrol ba'o// g.yon gyi dang po thod pa khrag gis bkang ba/ gnyis pa na mdung rtse gsum pa/ tha ma na zhags pa bsnams pa/ dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa'i steng na sangs rgyas mi spyod pa bzhugs pa/ dpral 
2b8(sngags): ba sin d+hu ras byugs pa/ mche ba brtsigs pa/ dbu dang skul/ sbrul dang rin po che'i brgyan gyis thubs pa/ mi mgo khrag 'dzag pa lnga bcu'i do shal byas pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs kyi steng du/ sbrul dang 
3a1(sngags): rin po che'i phreng ba'i skye rags bcings pa/ dril bu g.yer khas brgyan pa/ zhabs gnyis bgrad pas bgegs kyi rgyal po mgo g.yas su bstan pa mnan pa/ sku che la yan lag rags pa/ gzi brjid 'bar ba/ 
3a2(sngags): lha ma yin sde brgyad bran 'khor du 'dus par sgoms la/ oM AHhUM gsum gyis sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab/ lha dbang skur ba bya mi dgos te/ byas kyang 'gal ba med do// rang dang mgon po gnyis ka'i thugs kha nas 
3a3(sngags): 'od 'bros pas lho phyogs dur khrod kyi shing tsan dan gyi sdong po gcig gi steng nas rang bzhin gyi dpal nag po chen po spyan drangs te/ nam mkha' la tshur nA ma ru dang / dril bu g.yer kha'i skra dang bcas pa byon nas mdun gyi nam 
3a4(sngags): mkha' la bzhugs pa la/ na mo mahA kA la ya/ bo de sad ta mahA sad ta ya/ zhes phyag btsal la/ shrI mahA kA la dza/ zhes mdun bskyed nag po'i spyi bor dgug/ mahA kA la ya hUM gis dam tshig pa la ye shes pa bzhug/ maH 
3a5(sngags): kA la ya baM gyis gnyis su med par 'dres par bsam/ ma hA kA la hoHzhes pas mnyes par bya'o// de nas gzhung gzhan bzhin du mchod pa byas te/ khyad par du nag po chen po'i spos ni/ tsan dan dang / nyungs kar dang / 
3a6(sngags): sgog skra dang / sha chen dang / gu gul cha mnyam par sbar ba'i spos dbul/ yang na tsan dan dang / nyungs kar/ bu raM/ gu gul/ mi khrag gis sbas pa'i ril bu dbul lo// yang na gu gul mi khrag bsres la dbul lo// 
3a7(sngags): sngags ni/ tsa la na ni pu ra dza li/ dza la ki na ri li ka pa hUM kaM/ na ra wa pa/ ud d+ha ka b+h+yAM/ ka pe ka ra/ b+hi b+hi na/ sha d+ha pa d+ha bi la/ d+ha ma ru aM pa la e ka la/ ta he lo'i ya na/ a na d+ha/ e pa na tsa lu la e sa na/ si ra ma la/ 
3a8(sngags): ka hai na ra sa ta pa sha a sa ma thi s+thi/ ma hA kA la hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA// zhes bya'o// de nas skrod pa bya ste/ b+hU dpal ldan mgon po nag po gzi brjid che// ye shes rgyas phyir dbu skra gyen du 'bar// dbyings na bzhugs phyir mi bskyod/ 
3b1(sngags): na/ nga phyug+sa / // ga du / 
3b2(sngags): pha rol byin drug dag phyir phyag drug ldan// bdung bzhi rnam gcod rdo rje gri gug thogs// sngags rnams ma brjid gzungs ldan thod phreng bskams// bsang chos sgrog phyir cang te'u drag tu 'khrol// nyon mongs ma spangs 
3b3(sngags): dag phyir thod khrag bsnams// dug gsum snying 'bugs mdung rtse gsum ldan 'dzin// gdul bya mi 'dor rtag tu zhags pa bsnams// 'jigs pa bskyob phyir stag lpags sku spad bkris// bsod nams tshogs rdzogs sku 
3b4(sngags): mdog gzi brjid 'bar// 'khor ba'i skyon gyis mgos pad+ma'i gdan// ma rig mun sel nyi ma'i gdan stengs su// nyon mongs tshad sel zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// gdug pa 'dul rtags bgegs rgyal log 'dren man na// 
3b5(sngags): chos su mi 'gyur thob phyir sku mdog mthing nag 'bar// dgos 'dod skong phyir tsan dan steng na bzhugs// nag po chen po dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon gyi zhal bzhes rjes su dran mdzod la// bdag gis bcol ba'i 'brin 
3b6(sngags): mdang/ nga/ sa ra ma 
3b7(sngags): te/ rang gi snying kha nas 'od zer sngags kyi yi ger 'phros pas mchod par gyur// mgon po'i thugs kha nas 'od zer sngags kyi 'phreng ba tshur 'dus pas bdag byin gyis brlabs shing // dngos grub thob par bsams la srog
3b8(sngags): gi snying po 'di bzlas// oM badz+ra mahA kA la k+Shi k+She tra big na na bi na ya ka hUM hUM phaT phaT/ zhes gtam gyi bar ma chad par bzlas te/ de yang grangs 'bum phrag gsum maM/ bdun nam/ bcu bzlas pa 'am/ yang na tsan dan gyi shing gi rtsa ru zla ba 
4a1(sngags): drug garnas pa'ang/ bdun pa can nags su rnags pa dmas dang / bdun pa dang / rkunan pa zlas pa dang / byung zlang ga las tshig pa dang / zung bang yang badrung/ kye+e gdag/ thu lagasu pa pa dang / gdung 
4a2(sngags): byed dang 'thabs nas rgyal ba la sogs pa rmi ba dang / yang dang yang du 'byung ba dang / nyams dga' zhing ting nge 'dzin gsal ba la sogs pa nyams byung byung gi bar du zhag re la thun bzhi ru byas la bsnyen pa bya'o// thun re'i mchod pa dang bstod 
4a3(sngags): pa dang / nyams pa bshags pa dang / 'dod pa bsgrub par zhu ba byas la/ ye shes kyi mgon po nag po gshegs par bya/ bskyed pa'i nag pa chen po rang la bsdu/ spyod lam la sogs pa chos spyi dang 'thun pa/ de dag gis ni bsnyen pa'i bya 
4a4(sngags): thabs so// sgrub pa ni/ gnas dur khrod dam/ shing gcig gam/ ma mo'i khyim mam/ chu 'gram la sogs par dgos pa'i rdzas bsags la/ dkyil 'khor zla gang gru bzhi pa bya/ thig la sogs pa gzhung bzhin gdab/ tshon bri ba ni 
4a5(sngags): dbus gru gsum 'thing nag gtsang gis skor/ de'i mthar zlum po thod pa'i rab bya/ de gnyis bar gyi zla gam gsum dmar po// thod ra'i phyi'i gru chad bzhi ljang khu/ sgo la sogs pa gzhung ci ngang 'thun pa bri'o// dkyil 'khor dbus 
4a6(sngags): ska pa par gan pa chen paTI gzugs brnyan dbang / ga sa gsupa la lung dang / gnang ma dang thag na dang god/ gro bani sa shar du 'phags mnam rnam ste dgas can pa migag zad pa nan/ nA btu gas ldan dag sa na po 
4a7(sngags): byang du dpal re ma ti rnams kyi rtsa ka li dgod/ mgon nag 'khor gyi rten rdzas rnams/ mchod rdzas dang / las sbyor gyi rdzas rnams kyang bshams la/ rang stan bde ba la 'dug te/ byang chub mchog tu smon pa'i sems bskyed pas/ 
4a8(sngags): rang gi lhag pa'i lha gsal bar byas te/ snying po ci rigs bzlas par bya/ de nas dkyil 'khor mi dmigs pa las yi ge bruMm smug nag tu bsam/ de nas lha'i gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa bsam
4b1(sngags): nad gi dbus rim gyis mthog dbus gru gsum mthing dag/ de'i phyir blag thug sum dmar po// nga'i phyi mthul po ma mgo'i cig pas gtsang khang rtsigs pa/ de ljags gzer dang 'dra ba dam pa lcags kyis byas pa/ de rnams 
4b2(sngags): 'bar ba'i rnam pa can sgom/ de'i dbus su gru gsum gyi thog tu pad+ma dang / bgegs kyi rgyal po rtsigs pa'i steng du hUM las dpal mgon po nag po sngon bzhin sgom/ sgo bzhir legs ldan nag po chen po/ lhor nag po chen po gri gug thod 
4b3(sngags): pa can/ de gnyis yi ge hUM dmar nag dang / mthir nag las bskyed do// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o// beng ri tsan dan gyi bong dang thod khrag bsnams pa// gri gug ma ni rdo rje gri gug dang / thod khrag thogs pa'o// shar du ru spu ga nag nas 'phakra 
4b4(sngags): mnam gru ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma phyag na ral gri dang tha~Md khrag/ sku mdog spug nag go// byang du nag po chen po zhal gcig/ mi mar+tha 'i dang du ma coM rnaMs phyag gnyis pa/ ma thi ba bral d+ha d+ha pa phyag na ral gri deng phub thogs pa/ 
4b5(sngags): nag po chen po gsum dar nag gi ber gsol ba/ rin po che'i phreng ma gas ma ste le sa ma kraswa b+ha~M m+b+ha yang ra dra drangs pa dang 'dra bag 'i bya gang ba'i sku rags dang / lha mo'i sku stod zhing gi lpags pa/ oM mamanan lab N+DI ya du ba dz+ra 
4b6(sngags): yAn ga shA gas / nga nga byu nga / shA kyis ldan pasags pa dang rdzun ga ts+tsha nga 'du ba ma 
4b7(sngags): chol mthu rtsal che ba/ 'khor nag po chen po'i tshogs dang / ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro mo'i gtso mo la sogs pa/ chos skyong pa'i lham yin dpag du med pas yongs su bskor bar bsgom/ de dag gi sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs dang 
4b8(sngags): ye shes kyi mgon pa nag pa chen po 'khor bcas rnams dur khrod chen po gnas nas spyan drangs te/ bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa dang / khyag bcal ba dang / tshad pa dang bskye pa dam sa byas pa/ rjes papa gagizugs pas 
5a1(sngags): bon las 'od zer 'bros pas rdul tshon gtso bo'i thugs dam bskul/ de las 'od zer dang / sprul pa'i khro bo khro mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa phyogs bcur 'phros pas/ lo ka'i khams kun gyi chos skyong thams cad dbang du 
5a2(sngags): bsdus te las la bkol nas/ de dag gi sngagasil bdag gi dgra bgegs thams cad drag po mngon spyod kyis bsgral bar bsam/ sha khrag za zhing 'thung bar bsam la/ mgon nag chen po 'khor btsas bod pa'i sngags dang / rbad 
5a3(sngags): pa'i sngags dang / dgra bgegs bsad pa'i sngags dang / gsum tshang ba 'di dag gzhan dang ma 'dres par bzlas/ oM mahA kA la ya/ sha sa na/ a pa ka ra na/ re sham A bam+mA/ ma n+ta ka la ya/ i tan ta rad ra dra ya yA/ a paka 
5a4(sngags): denan/ ya te pra tig dz+haiM/ swA sa d+han du shesarba dus tang / sarba ta ka ya/ b+ha li/ kha bawAn/ bA ni/ mA ya m+b+ha ya/ b+h+yaHb+h+yaH/ b+h+yad+d+hab+han+tu/ han tan/ dAtadan/ paH paH/ de na ma ke nI mA ra ya n+darU paT paT swAt+ma/ nas sgrub 
5a5(sngags): gzhan gyis bar mchod par bzlas/ thun mtshams su mchod pa dang bstod pa dang / thugs dam bskul ba dang / ye shes pa che ste dang la stim/ dmachog lha la sogs pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid du shes par bya zhing / sems can thams 
5a6(sngags): cad kyi sdug bsngal la bltas te/ snying rje dang byams pa bsgom/ de la sgrub pa'i mtshan rtags ma byung bar du sgrub/ mtshan rtags ni skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pas tshur phyag byed pa dang / skye 'gro mang po bdag gi 'khor du 'dug pa dang // 
5a7(sngags): g.yog byed pa dang / byol song 'khol ba dang / sems can ci yang rung ba bsad pa rmi ba la sogs byung byed sgrub par bya/ de yang 'khor lo la rten nas sgrub pa dang / mnan bsreg skrag ma la brten te sgrub pa'o// 'khor lo la rten/ 
5a8(sngags): nas sgrub pa la gnyis/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang / drag po'i 'khor lo la rten pa'o// bsrung ba'i 'khor l-i ni/ nang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad/ phyi gri gug rtsibs brgyad/ de'i phyi me ri 'bar bas skor ba bri/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs 
5b1(sngags): re re la snyen sngags dang / bsrungs cig spel te/ oM badz+ra ma hA ka la k+Shi k+She tra big nan bi na ya ka hUM hUM che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM ma hA kA la sha pa na a pa tA ri sha ri dza/ a pa tse/ ma hA kA lo yaM/ i dan tA/ rang na tra ya ya/ 
5b2(sngags): a pa ka ri nan/ ya ti pra ti dzA sma ba si ta na duSh+Ta che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ 'di lan cig la ma shong na sbyar gyi bri'o// bri/ nang gi mu khrud la sngags rings bri/ lte ba la bsrung bya'i gzugs ming rus gnas bcas pa bris la/ gur gum mag+ni/ 
5b3(sngags): waM gyis rtsa ba mnan no// rab gnas byed na/ bskyed rims la sogs pa bsgoms la/ 'khor lo mi dmigs pa las yi ge praM bsam/ de las 'khor lo bskyed/ de'i steng du paM las pad ma dang / raM las nyi ma'i steng du sngags kyi yi
5b4(sngags): ge rnams bsams la/ de las 'od zer 'phros pas chos skyod bkug ste/ sngags kyi yi ge la thim pas yi ge rnams dpal nag po chen por skom/ de'i thugs khar pad+ma'i lte ba la nyi ma gnas par bsam/ de'i steng du sgrub sngags bsam 
5b5(sngags): nas/ bdag lhag pa'i lhar gsal ba'i thugs kha nas 'od zer sngags su 'phros pas/ dpal nag po chen po'i thugs khar pog/ de'i thugs kha las sngags 'od byung nas zhal nas 'thon te/ bdag gi zhal nas thugs khar
5b6(sngags): thim pas sdig sgrib dag cing / sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa'i mthu skyed par bsam/ sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dam ci nus bzlas la/ mchod stod bya/ ye shes lha gshegs/ dam tshig lha zhu nas/ sngags kyi yi ge'i gzugs su gyur 
5b7(sngags): par bsam/ me tog dkar po la rten 'brel sngags te/ gtor bas kyang / sngags nyid mgon po'i rang bzhin yin la/ mgon nag nyid sngags kyi gzugs su bzhugs pas/ cis kyang gzhom du med pa rdo rje'i yi ge rabasams 
5b8(sngags): la bsrung bya'i yul la gdags te/ de'i lus rdo rje'i rang bzhin/ yi ge btags pas cis kyang mi tshugs par bsam/ cho ga gzhan ci dang 'thun no// 'khor lo la rten de drag po'i sgrub pa byed na/ 'khor lo gnyis byas te/ gnyis
6a1(sngags): pa byi'i ri mo zlum po bzhi rim du skor ba'i mu khyud sum rim bya/ rim phyi rol ma'i byi me ris skor/ mu khyung phyi rim ma la snyen sngags la mA ra ya phaT btags pa dbu rtsi ru bstan pa bri/ ba ra ma la gri gug rdo nang du 
6a2(sngags): bstan pa ci mang du bri'o// nang ma la sgrub sngags dbu phyi ru bstan pa 'khor bar dgod/ ri mo zlum pa nang ma'i ngos su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rtse nang du bstan pa bri/ rtsibs brgyad la 'khor lo'i sngags brgyad bris la/ kha9 
6a3(sngags): khA hi khA hi che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ mA ra ya mA ra ya che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ g+haM d+hAg+h+r-i hA che ga mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ bAn+d+ha bAd+d+ha che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ta na ha na a mu ka mA ra ya hUM phaT/ da had ta che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa che ge ma 
6a4(sngags): mA ra ya hUM pa gdan me ke ni a mu ka mA ra ya hUM phaT/ zhes pa rnams so// dbus su sgrub bya'i gzugs ming rus dang sngags su bcas pa bri'o// de yang 'khor lo steng ma'i mdun na g.yas ngos na pa ra la 'khor bar bri'o/ 'og 
6a5(sngags): ma'i yi ga g.yon du 'khor bar bri/ rtsibs brgyad kyi dbu nang du bstan pa bri/ de rnams khrag chen dang drug gis byugs la/ 'khor lo gnyis kha sbyar te/ bar du li dag bris la bzhugs/ de thod par btsug la thod pa 'grub khung 
6a6(sngags): du bcug la/ de nas yi dam lhar bskyed/ mdun du dpal nag po chen po bskyed la dgug gzhug la sogs pa bya ste/ bsnyen sngags brgya tsam bzlas/ de'i rjes su 'khor lo stong par bsgoms la der bral/ gnam lcags mtshan
6a7(sngags): tsha'i 'khor lo ma 'bar bar bsgoms la/ 'khor lo'i bar gyi ling ga la Ni 'am/ traM las sgrub bya ba sems la/ rang lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas te/ dpal nag po chen po las sprul pa'i khro tshogs la lcags kyu dang / thob thogs pa mang 
6a8(sngags): pe 'phros te/ bsgral bya rang rgyud kyi gnas nas dgug par bya/ lcags kyus snying nas bzung / thobs rgyab nas phul/ bkug nas sngar gyi sgrub bya la bzhug/ de nas 'khor lo skor te/ 'khor lo drag tu 'khor ba dang / dpal nag/ 
6b1(sngags): dang / brdzu du pas/ da ba sa/ gal mas du shA gnags pa gas/ d+ha dang / lcagags pad pa sa rnanas papa yang du bad+mang / gang ga 
6b2(sngags): bsregs cing chos pa yang thod par blangs nas gsol bar bsgom/ lhag ma thal bar yang song bar bsam/ bsnyen sngags dang las sngags sbrel la ci nus su rang res skabs su bzlas shing thun gyis brab po// de ltar zhag bdun nam bcu 
6b3(sngags): bzhi nyi shu rtsa cig tu sgrub par bya'o// // mnan sreg skrag ma la rten te sgrub na/ 'khor lo'am/ 'khor lo med pa'i ling ga bris pa yang rung te/ rang gi mal 'og 'brub khung bcas par bcug la/ mdun du mchod rdzas dang mtha 
6b4(sngags): la sogs pa bshams te/ me thab tu nyin gung ngam mtshan gung la ling kha bsro zhing / yang mal 'og tu mnan par bya/ cho ga gzhan sgrub pa ci dang 'thun no// de ltar zhag bdun nam/ bcu bzhi'am/ nyi shu rtsa cig bya'o// gtor ma 
6b5(sngags): labarten te sgrub na/ maN+Dal steng du gtar snod bzhag te bre gang yan chad kyi tshal gtor ma bya/ gtor ma de zur gsum pa rtswab zlum por byas la/ gtor mda' ma de'u ni thog lcags sam/ mi bsad pa'i lcags dum bu 
6b6(sngags): gzugs/ ras kha tshar ma nyams pas yol ba bya/ mda' la dar nag btags la gzugs/ maN+Dal steng du mchod rdzas ci 'byor pa yang bsham/ me tog tsham bu lnga dgod/ dpal nag po chen po'i rten yod na steng du 
6b7(sngags): gzugs/ gtor ma'i nang du 'khor lo'am ling ga bzhug/ de nas cho ga ga'ang bzhin byas la maN+Dal steng gi rten nam/ me tog tshom bu lnga ru bskyed la/ dzad+hU ba to/ ye shes pa dgrag bzhug cing / dgyes par bya/ dbang 
6b8(sngags): bskur rgyas gang ba byed na yang byas la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa bya/ de nas gtong ma song par bas ma la/ der ka las gtor snong thod pa chen por bsam/ de'i nang du gtor ma'i dngos po dang / ling g.yi ge Ni 'am dri las 
7a1(sngags): dgra 'am bgegs gang 'dod par skyed la/ rang dang dpal nag po chen po'i thugs kha nas 'od zer dpag tu med pa las/ las kyi mgon po thugs kha nas khro bo dang khro mo rnams spros pas/ gnod byed kyi 
7a2(sngags): lus sems rang dbang med par bkug pa dang / bskyed pa de la snyim pa dang / mtshon chas btubs pa la sogs pa bya zhing / thun rdeg cing sngags rings bzlas so// yang skul ba'i ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro lag da thod pa thogs pa 
7a3(sngags): mang pos sbal ba'i sha khrag zod pas bcus te/ nag po chen po tshogs la rol/ rang re yang rol bar bsam mo// thun 'jog tsam na mchod pa/ bstod pa/ nyams grib bshags pa dang / las la skul bar bya/ ye shes lnga ner 
7a4(sngags): gshegs su mi gsol/ rten la bzhugs par bya/ rang spyod lam dge ba dang / mi 'bral bar bya'o// thun gzhan la 'jug rtsan/ dam tshig gi dpal nag po chen po byas la/ ye shes pa spyan drangs nas snyim pa la sogs 
7a5(sngags): bsnga ma bzhir bya'o// dgra bgegs tshar gcod pa'i rtags byung na gtor ma btang te/ nad pa'i gdon 'dul ba yin na/ gtor ma'i bud tsam zhig bzhag la/ de nas gtor ma gnod byed phyogs su btang te/ gtor ma stel 
7a6(sngags): mis gos nag bgo/ med na dar nag gi 'phan lus la gzugs/ gtar ma la lam phye sgo phye byas la gtor mthor du 'phang ngo btang ngo // de nas 'phangs nas yon tan dpag tu med pa 'byung ba las/ pan yon mdor bsdus pa 
7a7(sngags): drug ste/ chos skyong mnyes pa dang / tshogs stug pa dang / dam tshig nyams pa'i dri ma 'dag pa dang / bar chad mi 'byung ba dang / dngos grub sgrub pa'i grogs su 'gro ba dang / 'phrin las sgrub pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba ste 
7a8(sngags): don chen por 'gyur ro// nag po'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o// byis pa chung ngu'i gdon bsrung ba dang / de la sogs pa'i me ske bog la sogs pa'i nad gso ba dang / ser ba bsrung ba dang / gzhan gyi sbyor ngan zlog pa dang / chang nyes 
7b1(sngags): nas bsrung ba dang / gzhan pa'i bsrung ba gags pa rtsub banang na da// b+has dang gdang ba dang / rgyas pa dun 'dugan/ bsrung ba ba la sgrub pa sdung / dbyas pa/ bslang ba bsku gdags/ bsru du/ 
7b2(sngags): nagator chen ltar bzung la/ 'brub khung bcas la/ ling kha mang du bris la bzhug/ de nas mtshams gcad pa grub na legs mi grub na bya ba gzhan bzhus la/ dpal nag po chen po'i skyed rim bsnyen po bzhin byas la/ bsnyen rtsa 
7b3(sngags): dang sngags rings la thun bzhir bzlas pa bya zhing / nyungs kar la sogs pas bra ba/ gri dang pur pa la sogs pa brdeg/ skabs su mchod bstod dang bskul bya/ 'phral gtor btang ngo // g.yas rnobs dgra bshegs thul lo zer ram/ 
7b4(sngags): mthul zer yang de dag la yid brtan du mi rung bas/ rang ngam bsrung bya'i gza' tshol sems can bsad pa dang / tshig pa la sogs pa byung gi bar du 'phrin las ma bshol bar bya'o// de nas bsreg mnan yang bya'o// ser ba 
7b5(sngags): bsrung na lo cho ga gzhan bzhin byas la/ khro bo bcu'i sngags bzlas pa'i rdzas kyis bsrung bskor la/ thal chen dang nyungs kar la sngags rings bzlas la sprin nag la gtor ro// sbyong ngan phyir la bzlog la/ rang dpal chen po 
7b6(sngags): snyoms pa/ 'khor la rtsabs bcu ba rgya ru sam/ 'tshar ma nang du phyogs zung bcud kyil ba'i sted du zab bcu ba sems pa 'khong la bskong ngo // ni tshang bsrung na/ sngags pazlas nas ngas ka thugs pas drug 
7b7(sngags): skams na nu ma la dud pas bdug/ sngags bzlas pa'i 'jim pas byug/ de dag la sngon du gtor ma btang ba gal che'o// mnan pa byed na/ gtor ma chen po bshams la/ mnan pa'i 'khor lo bri ba ni/ byi'i mu gsum/ 
7b8(sngags): bsad pa'i 'khor lo ltar byas la/ khyad par du las kyis kha sbyar ba ni/ mA ra ya byA sar de'i tsha ba ma ste b+ha ne ku ru laM bri/ dbus su mu khyud so la de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rtsibs la rtse mo phyi ru bstan pa byas la rtsibs la waM 
8a1(sngags): / bo bcu'i sngags re bris nas de nas dgra 'am bgegs gang la byas pa de la dgod/ de nas dang po dgug bzhug byas la/ 'grub khung gru gsum rang gi mal 'og tu bru/ kha khyer sor bzhi phyir skyed la 
8a2(sngags): sor gnyis spangs su rtsig/ shog bul ling ga mang du bris te/ gzugs byas pa'i snying khar bzhug/ gzugs brnyan gyi skel tha gu nag po btags la/ rang gi srin lag gis bzung dang po dang / skabs skabs su dgug bzhug mang 
8a3(sngags): du bya/ skabs su'am zin zin tha gu shing phur la rtod/ 'brub khung du ling ga bcug la de'i kha g.yam pas bcad/ g.yam pa de'i steng du ri rab gling bzhi dang bcas pa bri/ 'og ngos su rdo rje rgya gram bris la kha gcad 
8a4(sngags): de na sa gtor chen bshams la sha lngar byin gyis brlabs/ de'i steng du dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed la/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la stim/ sngags rings brgya rtsa bzlas shing / rang gi thugs kha nas 'od 
8a5(sngags): byung nas kha nas 'thon/ mgon po'i thugs khar thim/ lte ba nas khro bo dang khro mo 'thon/ mnan bya bgug ste ling ga la stim/ khro mo khro bo rang gi snying khar bsdu ba yang dang yang du bsam/ bzlas pa 'phro gcod 
8a6(sngags): na sngags rang la bsnga/ chos skyong la gtor ma dang maN+Dal dbul/ 'dod pa'i don zhu ba'i gsol ba gdab/ ye shes lha gshegs/ dam tshig lha de kar bzhag/ rim pa de ltar grub rtags ma byung bar du bya/ grub rtags ni/ 
8a7(sngags): dmag grangs pa dang / chu bo chen po skyes pa dang / grong khyer mes tshig pa dang / bdag gam gzhan gnod byed la sogs pa las rgyal ba dang / sems can bsad pa la sogs pa byung na mnan pa bya ste/ gtor chen steng nas dpal 
8a8(sngags): mgon po steg ste/ bar sdang la bzhugs pa la yang ye shes lha spyan drangs la bzhug/ mchod pa bya/ gtor ma la yang byin brlabs byas la bsngo ba bya/ rang gi 'og gi 'khor lo ston/ gtor ma'i khar bzhag/ gnod byed 
8b1(sngags): / nga / 2 byas/ na bya 'dra gan pag na rnas pa shu pa ma byung ba banas pa btab par bya// dan gas 
8b2(sngags): gshegs/ dam tshig pa rang la bsdu'o// de nas mnan pa'i sa ni dge 'dun gnas pa'i them pa'i 'og gi/ mchod rten rab gnas byas pa'i 'og tu bcug la rdo rje rgya gram byas pa'i g.yam pas kha bcad la kha sa sa dgab/ rkang 
8b3(sngags): pa g.yas pas mnan de'i steng du gtor ma blugs/ des gnod byed mi 'tshir ro// mnan pa'i las so// drag po'i sbyin bsreg gis btub pa'am bsad pa ni/ maN+Dal gru ba'i rgyur khru gang pa byas la de'i steng logs kyi 'tho 
8b4(sngags): dang rgya mnyam pa zlum po 'phangs su khru gang ba/ zheng sor bzhi rtsig/ steng du skyed bu gzugs/ phyogs gsum du sgo re bya/ de'i nang du bud shing se ba la sogs pa tsher ma can gyis dgang / de'i steng du bye ma blag la bzhag/ 
8b5(sngags): de'i rtsa ru yang 'brub khung logs rel khrur yod pa byas la der ling ga mang po bzhug/ mgon po bskyed/ dgug bzhug bya ba la sogs pa sngar bzhin byas la/ mgon po'i sngags rings/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ston pa mang po 
8b6(sngags): bzlas/ gnod byed skyed la dgug bzhug la na mang po b+ha/ zhugs pa'i yid ches pa byung nas/ phur pa dang mtshon cha bskrun/ dum bu mang dum song bar du gsad par bsam par bya/ de nas ling ga'i rol lag pas 
8b7(sngags): mi bzung bar 'dzin byed gzhan gyis bzung la slar bzhin bsgyur ste/ phur pa'am mtshon gyis bye ma bkrug/ ling ga tshig pa dang / rang gi 'og tu dong gru gsum pa byas la/ de'i nang du bye ma blag la/ g.yam pa la 'og tu rdo rje 
8b8(sngags): rgya gram/ steng du gling bzhi dang bcas pa'i ri rab bris pa can gyis kha gcad/ de'i steng du rang bsdad la rmi lam ston cig par gsol ba gdab/ rmi lam bzang na drag po'i sbyin bsreg bya/ ngan na bzlas pa mang du byas nas 'og gi/ 
9a1(sngags): bye ma byang la/ dge 'dun gyi them pa la sogs par mnan/ de nas sbyin sreg bya'o// drag po'i sbyin bsreg bya bar 'dod na/ maN+Dal gru bzhi byas pa'i steng du/ rgya dang spangs khru re tsam pa gru gsum pa
9a2(sngags): rtsig/ de dag nag por bya/ gru gsum gyi mtha' mar me ri dmar po bri/ mdun la nye bar mchod rdzas bsham/ gtor chen yang bshams la bzhag/ nas bro dang / sha chen la sogs pa'i sreg rdzas yang ci mang ci bzang du 
9a3(sngags): bshams/ g.yas su mgon po 'khor bcas kyi gtor ma bsham/ g.yon du bgegs kyi gtor ma bsham par bya/ mgon po'i gtor ma bshams par bya/ mgon po'i rten yod na dgod/ med na mda' bya rgod ma dang / da 
9a4(sngags): nag po dang / skyes pa gring shi ba'i snying dang gsum/ dar dang snying mda' la btags pa gzugs/ sreg rdzas mi khrag dang nyungs kar dang / btsan dug dang / thal nur rnams sbyar la/ ling gA dang sbags la sreg go// 'khrul 
9a5(sngags): 'khor bcas pa yang dgug bzhug byas la mtshon gyis btub cing / oM ma hA kA la g+h+nAM hA b+h+r-iny+dza/ oM ma hA kA la b+han d+ha b+ha na d+h+waM/ oM ma hA kA la shri/ ha na ha ha/ oM ma hA kA la ya d+ha ra ya d+ha ra ya/ oM ma hA kA la shri/ g+h+raM kar+m+ma ku ru hUM 
9a6(sngags): phaT/ zhes sngags rings kyi bsham du btags la mu khyud le bri'o// sngags de bzlas par yang bya'o// rang gi 'khrul 'khor bsad pa dang / mthon bskyed pa dang / dgug bzhug sngar ltar bya'o// rang lha'i rnal 'byor nas 
9a7(sngags): bgegs gtor btang / mtshams gcad/ mchod rdzas byin gyis brlab/ de nas thab khung du raM las med pung bsam pa'i dbus su/ hUM las dam tshig mgon po bskyed/ ye shes mgon po spyan drangs/ mdun gyi 
9a8(sngags): nam mkha' la byon pa dang / dzaHhUM baM hoHdgug bzhug cing dgyes par bya/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab/ mi bskyod pa dbul sgom mo// de nas 'khor lo dang / ling ga dang / bsreg rdzas bsres la lha la dbul 
9b1(sngags): sreg rdzastsa la lag pa mi rig par dgang gzar gyis thugs/ rab brgya rtsa brgyad/ bring lngab cu rgya ban/ sngags rangs bzlas pa dbul/ sngags kya ba sham la/ oM ag ne ye de wa te dz+wa la raM/ zhes btags la 
9b2(sngags): bzlas so// de'i dus su/ gsal ba rnam pa gsum gal che ste/ rang yi dam gsal ba/ bsreg rdzas gnod byed du gsal ba/ me tshos skyong du gsal ba'o// rdzas ma zad par shing zad na/ shing gzhan gyis gsos 
9b3(sngags): la bya/ rdzas zad pa dang / ye shes lha bye la rang laM bzhug/ dam tshig lha rang la btus la skyed bu gsum gzugs/ de'i steng du glang btsugs la mar khu blugs/ de'i 'og tu me sbar la mar khu khol ba dang / raM las 
9b4(sngags): me dpung bskyed la/ reg bya cha ba dus mtha'i me lta bu bsam ning / sreg rdzas rnams gnod byed du bsams la/ bsreg cing nyungs kar dang / lcags tshe dang / dug phye gsum gyis brab/ ji srid mang bum skams 
9b5(sngags): bar du gnod byed bkug cing thabs la/ mar 'u zad pa dang grwa nga'i nang gi rdzas mchig pa dang / sol ba rnams bsdus nas de'i steng du g+hu ra kha sbub pa'i steng du ga tor chen bzhag la/ mgon po 'khor dang bcas 
9b6(sngags): pa la gtor chen dbul/ 'dod don zhu ba'i gsol ba btab/ gtor ma rda la sogs pa'i sgra dang bcas pas btang ngo // mgon po rang bzhin gyi gnas su gshegs/ 'khor gyi gtor ma btang ngo // gtor chen gyi 
9b7(sngags): gtor ma btang zin pa dang / gla nga kha sbyar ba dbye/ sol ba de sa yis kha man na/ nang par chags la tshul gdab/ yang na rlung la byar btang / sbyin bsreg lag len no// // A~M/ dpal nag po chen po 'di 
9b8(sngags): nag po gzhan gang bas kyang byin brlabs myur la che bas/ sgrub pa po bkra shis la bsams pa 'grub/ spyir sngags thams cad nas rdo rje slob dpon la dus rtag tu bsnyen bskur bya ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig bsrung 
10a1(sngags): dgos pa rnams/ 'di sgrub pa pos kyang bsrung zhing / sgrub pa byas na/ thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub thob bo// dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ bde gtsang ba/ dpal sha ba ri pa chen pos 
10a2(sngags): mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta a ta ya badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba pur bu 'od kyis bskur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa'o// dpe 'di la shin tu dam pa'i bka' rgyas btab bo// dpal 'byor 
10a3(sngags): lha mdzes lha'i dbang po dang // 'dra zhing rnam spyod pa ge mtho mimanyam dong ba yi// phyag dpe dgos 'dod shangs padu ga sring pa rin chen phreng ba 'di// ga ru ra b+ha Ta bdag gis bzabs pa lags// 
10a4(sngags): phyag drug ye shes mgon po'i chos bskor las/ shA ba ri pas mdzad pa'i gsang sgrub bzhug so// rgya gar skad du/ gu h+ya swa krung po bzang po d+ha na ma/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes 
10a5(sngags): bya ba spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// dben par tshogs gnyis sngon 'gro bas// bsrung ba rdo rje chos 'byung nang // rlung me chus lhun po'i steng // b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang pa'i dbus// sna tshogs pad+ma/ 
10a6(sngags): nyi zla'i steng // tshogs bdag po mo 'gyel ba'i steng // dpal ldan grags chen he ru ka/ zhal gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gri gug thod pa Da ma ru// thod pa rtse gsum zhags pa can// g.yon 
10a7(sngags): rkyang gar gyis rol pa'i sku// sbrul dang rus pa'i brgyan gyis spras// stag lpags grol ba dpa' bo'i sku// gsang ba ye shes ra ga'i 'od// zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ma// Ta ma ru dang
10a8(sngags): thod pa can// g.yas rkyang stabs kyis yab la 'khyud// las bzhir skra dang yon tan rigs// gsung dang 'phrin las bdud rtsi can// 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang // sna tshogs rdo rje rab mdze sa pI/ 
10b1(sngags): gri gug 'dzin sogs mgon po bzhi// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las// yab 'dra'i mdog can gtso mo'i tshul// dkar ser dmar dang ljang khu yi// tshogs bdag steng du rol par bzhugs// zhi rgyas 
10b2(sngags): dbang dang mngon spyod 'grub// gra phyogs sgeg bdug sogs brgyad dam// bcu drug sna tshogs mchod sprin can// sgo bzhir padad+ma nyi ro'i steng // k+She tra pA la gri thod 'dzin// dzi na mi tre beng dang tha~Md/ 
10b3(sngags): TA kI ra dza lcags kyu thod// gtum po trag shad mdung zhags 'dzin// byams la phyogs skyong rgyal chen te// bcu bzhi nang gi rim pa las// de phyir lha chen 'jigs byed dgu/ klu dang gza' ste so 
10b4(sngags): gsum mo// de'i phyir rgyu sar nyi shu brgyad// gtsang rigs mgon po bdun bcu lnga// sna tshogs mdzes pa'i brgyan gyis spras// phyi rol khor yug dur khrod brgyad// sku gsung thugs dang yon 
10b5(sngags): tan dang // 'phrin las sprul pa mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// 'bring dkar ser dmar ldeng ba yi// dam can rgya mtsho 'jigs gzugs can// lha swa sgrib bral 'od gzugs kyis// dpral mgrin snying ste/ 
10b6(sngags): gsang ba'i gnas// oM daM kar sku dang a dmar gsung // hUM 'thing thugs sogs yon tan ser// ha ljang 'phrin las lnga yig ni// bdun rgya bo nges pa'i rtags brgya'o// 'phro 'dra'i 'od zer mtha' 
10b7(sngags): yas kyis// ye shes spyan drangs gnyis med pa'i// spyi bo ri mi spyod la sogs lnga// thugs kar pad nyi zla hUM mthar// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+She k+She tra pA la b+hi ga na nA bi na ya ka hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA 
10b8(sngags): oM k+She tra pA la b+hi ga nan hU~M phaT/ bud d+ha rad na pad ma dang // badz+ra karma rus bstan bzhin// thabs sbyar sngags dang shes rab bskur// zhal shes rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor pa// sprul sbyar 
11a1(sngags): sngags sham ldan pa yis// sangs rgyas bstan pa dar rgyas spel// dkon mchog dbu 'phangs bstod pa dang // sems can phan bde 'god la sogs// sngags kyi 'od 
11a2(sngags): zer 'phreng ba can// ni rgyas dbang brag sna tshogs las// gang dgos yid bzhin myur du 'grub// log lta the tshem rab spangs nas// dad mos rab gus brtson 'grus ldan// bsnyen bsgrub dam tshig la 
11a3(sngags): gnas shing // byang chub sems dang ldan pa de// bkra shes bde legs ldan par 'gyur// gsang bsgrub rim pa dam pa'o// sha ba ris mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// man+tal 
11a4(sngags): ye shes kyi mgon po phyag drug pa'i bstod pa lags// rgya gang skad du/ mahA ki la a k+Sho ba stod tha na ma/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po'i stong pa rngam pa sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba 
11a5(sngags): mUr mdzad spyan ras gzigs la phrag 'tshal lo// oM grub par gyur cig/ hUM dur khrod chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i nang // tshang tshing 'khrigs pa tsan dan chen po'i tshal// skal pa me ltar 'bar 
11a6(sngags): klung dky-il nas// bgags can rnal pa gang na pa rab na mazhengs// pi na gal phyag drug 'jigs pa / na lugs mi zang 'bang ba las// rlung nang nas shes rab tu brtan pa/ 
11a7(sngags): gsung gi nga ro mi zad 'bar ba las// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra'i stong gsum 'gengs// rnam dag thugs ni mi zang 'bar ba las// spros dang bral ba'i mtshan ma spyir yang ston// sku gsung thugs kyi 
11a8(sngags): sgo nas khyod la stong // phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po'i gri gug gis// nyon mongs rtsad nas bcad nas dgral 'phyang // 'brang ba 'dzin pas skye 'gro rtsis lo 'debs// Da ma ru'i mkha' 'gro 
11b1(sngags): dbang du bsdud // 'jig rten 'das pa'i gcal phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yon gyi dang pos tha~Mng zag bsdams pa ni// dpagaras stsogartsa zhal drugs lab po// mdung rtsi gsum pa sa khams 
11b2(sngags): gsum dbade du bsdud// zhags pas dmanyams ma lus 'ching bar mdzad// byin brlabs dngos grub gta ril skyabs su mchi// chos kyi skul 'gyur ba med brtags su// sku ma dag mthing nag 
11b3(sngags): rab tu 'bar ba la// khrag 'dzag lnga bcu rtsa lngas brgyan pa po// stag gi lpags pa sbrul gyis chun pos mdzes// ma T+wA~M ka la rtsod la phyag 'tshal lo// byi na ya k+Sha gnol ba'i gdan steng na// krig krig 
11b4(sngags): nabs kyi dgra bgegs thal bar klog/ zhal gdangs pache ba brtsegs shing rngam pa yis// dam nyams khong khrag 'dren cing zhal du gsol// spyan gsum ma ltar 'bar zhing skad pa yis// khams 
11b5(sngags): gsum dbang du bsdad cing rtsi sa la 'debs// dbusa'abang brjes pa'i spyi bon// mi spyod rgyal po rab tu brtan pa po// dbang bzhi yongs su rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo// d+hU bzhengs cig brnangs 
11b6(sngags): cig chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs// bskal la bskul lo 'gro ba'i don la bskul// thugs dam chung bsngal phrin las gzhar ba mdzad// ma g.yel ma g.yel dpal ldan nag po che// slob pa 
11b7(sngags): shAkya seng ge'i spyan mnga' ru// bstan pa bsrung bar khas blang dam bcas pa'i// las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzad// skyes bu dam pa blo dang ldan pa yi// bstod pa 'di yis lan cig
11b8(sngags): stong byas nas// pham bu tsha rnams la brtsa ba bzhin// nag po chen pos rtag tu bsrung bar mdzad// nag po chen po'i bstod pa rngam pa sgra sbags zhes bya ba bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa rdzom s+ho// 
12a1(sngags): hUM bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// dpal ldan 'jigs byed nag po chen po ni// chos nyid mi 'gyur sku mdog mthing nag zhal// ye shes rgyas phyir dbu skra gyen du 
12a2(sngags): 'bar// dbyings ni bzhugs phyir mi skyod rgya yis btab// mkha' 'gro 'dul phyir sin d+hA ra'i sa mtshan// rigs lnga'i rang bzhin thod pas dbu la brgyan// dus gsum mkhyen phyir spyan 
12a3(sngags): gsum rnam par gzigs// gdug po 'dul phyir mche ba rnam par rtsigs// pha rol phyin drug dag phyir phyag drug pa// klu rgyal dbang du bsdud phyir sbrul gyis brgyan// nyon mongs ma lus
12a4(sngags): rtsad nas gcod pa'i phyir// g.yas pa'i dang po gri gug thugs khar 'dzin// sems can thams cad mi brjod 'dren pa'i phyir// bar bzod skam 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'dzin// chos rnams thams 
12a5(sngags): cad stong par sgrogs pa'i phyir// tha ma shes rab Da ma ru yi sgra// rnam par rtog pa rtsad nas spangs pa'i phyir// g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag thugs khar 'dzin// dug gsum ma lus bdud nas 
12a6(sngags): gcod pa'i phyir// bar pa kha T+wAM rtse gsum phyag na bsdams// srid gsum gdug pa ma lus 'ching ba'i phyir// tha ma bdud zhags nag po bsdog cing bsnams// 'jigs pa ma lus sbyong zhing
12a7(sngags): skyob pa'i phyir// sku smad stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can// nyon mongs skem phyir nyi ma'i gzi brjid 'bar// skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// gdug pa 'dul phyir byin// 
12a8(sngags): yak+Sha mnan// dgos 'dod sgrub phyir tsan dan dkyil na bzhugs// dpal ldan nag po chen po khyod la bstod// sngon gyi zhal bzhes rjes su dran mdzod la// sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma 
12b1(sngags): 'di bzhes la// rnal 'byor btsal ba'i phyin las grub par mdzod// mgan po'i gzhung bstod bla ma dbu las mdzad pa'o// // d+hU byin brlabs nag btsun pa na// zhal gcig 
12b2(sngags): phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// dur khrod phyag rgyas sku la brgyan// zhal gcig mthing nag rngam po ni// chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos rtagra// 
12b3(sngags): phyag drug brda' dang ldan pa ni// pha rol phyin drug rdzogs pa'i rtags// zhabs gnyis bgegs chen gnan pa ni// bgegs rnams bran du bskol ba'i rtags// phyag g.yas gri gug bsnam 
12b4(sngags): pa ni// nyon mongs rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// bar pa 'phreng ba 'dren pa ni// sems can mi brjed 'dren pa'i rtags// tha ma cad te'u 'khrol ba ni// chos kyi sgra chen sgrogs pa'i 
12b5(sngags): rtags// g.yon pa thod pa bsnams pa ni// rnam par rtogs pa gcod pa'i rtags// bar pa kha T+wAM bsnams pa ni// dug gsum rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// tha ma zhags pa bsnams 
12b6(sngags): pa ni// sems can bcings pa bsgrol ba'i rtags// zhal gdangs mche brtsigs pa ni// nyams pa'i sha la rol pa'i rtogs// spyan gsum me ltar 'bar ba ni// dug gsum sems 
12b7(sngags): can sgrol ba'i rtags// dbu skra gyen du rjes pa ni// rnal 'byor thar par 'dren pa'i rtags// sin d+hA ra yis mtshan pa ni// mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdud pa'i rtags// mi skyod pa yis 
12b8(sngags): brgyan pa ni// dbang bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa'i rtags// byin brlabs nag po chen po la// bdag ni dad pas phyag 'tshal lo// bram ze sa ra hes zhal gzigs dus su rtogs kyis/ 
13a1(sngags): bsgo nas bstod pa'o// // hUM lho phyogs rnam dag tsan dan shing gi gseb// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor chen po las// thugs kyis sprul pa ma hA ka la ni/ 
13a2(sngags): sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag drug pa// stobs chen rab 'bar 'gyings pa'i cha byang can// khro gnyer rab 'jigs mthing nag brjid pa'i sku// dmar la zlum po'i spyan gsum me 'od 
13a3(sngags): 'phro// shangs nas rlung 'byung 'jig rten g.yo bar byed// rab tu 'jigs pa'i ljags la hUM sgra sgrogs// rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshems bskrad mche ba rtsigs// bar nas rdo rje'i khrag gis gser 
13a4(sngags): chen 'bebs// rmi na ma'i a tshom bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// thod pa lngas brgyan mi spyod dbre brgyan can// drag po dbu skra kham ser gyen du 'bar// skegs pa'i nyams ldan dar gyi 
13a5(sngags): cod pa na mdzes// 'gur gyi bum par gsang ba'i gshugs glu len// hUM dang paT kyi glu sgra dwi ri raM// sku stod glang chen ko bas brgyan pa yang // dpal thul chen po'i gyad las khyad 
13a6(sngags): par 'phags// sku smad stag gi lpags pas dkris pa ni// khams gsum g.yul rgyal srid gsum zil gyis gnon// bdud bzhi sreg mdzod me dpung klong na 'gying // rnam rtog spang phyir mi 
13a7(sngags): ro'i gdan la bzhugs// pha rol phyin drug rdzogs phyir phyag drug pa// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po spyan ras gzigs// 'khor ba'i rnam rtog spang phyir mgo 'phreng can// ma hA ka la khrag 
13a8(sngags): mthung rgyal po khyod// gri gug rab tu 'bar bas dgra srog gcod// thod skam phreng bas dgra bgegs rtsis la 'debs// Da ma rus mkha' 'gro ma tshogs bsdud// thod rlon rab tu 'bar 
13b1(sngags): bas dgra khrag gsol// mdung rtse gsum pos srid gsum dbang du bsdud// bdud zhags nag pos skye nas 'dzin par byed// tsan dan be con klad pa'i rgya srubs 'gas// khyod kyi sprul pa 
13b2(sngags): nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// gdug pa'i gnod sbyin 'bum gyi 'khor gyis bskor// k+She Ta pa la la sogs las la 'gyed// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams bran du 'khol// dkar po'i 
13b3(sngags): chos skyong nag po'i dpung 'joms pa'i// ma hA ka lo lnga mchog chen po la// bdag cag bstod dang gtor ma drag tu 'bral// rtse bas dgongs la bu bzhin sgrub du gsol// bcol ba'i phrin 
13b4(sngags): las lhun gyis grub par mdzod// dpal sha ba ri bas mgon po'i zhal gzigs pa'i dus su don gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o// // phyag bzhi pa gtso rgyang klu sgrub lugs kyi sgrub zab so// 
13b5(sngags): / rgya gar skad du/ tsa tur+N+Na dza ma hA kA la sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po phyag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs/ dpal nag po chen po phyag bzhi pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dang por 
13b6(sngags): shig sngags pas rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid rdzogs par byas nas/ de'i rjes su nam mkha'i phyogs su paM yig yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma/ de'i steng du AHyig yongasu 
13b7(sngags): gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su yaM ge hUM gi sa bon yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ de'i lte bar hUM gi yi ge bltas la/ de'i 'od zer gyis gdod ma nas grub pa'i 'chad par 
13b8(sngags): 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la sogs pa can gyi nag po chen po spyan drangs la/ hUM gi yi ge las spros pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yang dag par mchod cing / sdig pa bshags pa la sog 
14a1(sngags): pa bya'o// yang dag par bstod nas/ oM AHhUM badz+ra maN+Da la muHde nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o// de ma thag par tha mal pa'i lus kyi dngos po med pa 
14a2(sngags): bltas te/ chos thams cad bdag med par lhag par mos nas/ oM shAr+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o// de nas pad+mar a yig yongs su gyur 
14a3(sngags): pa las zla ba'o// zla ba de la hUM yig dkar po bltas nas/ de yongs su gyur pa las ral gri'o// de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la hUM gi sa bon gyis byin gyis brlab po// de thams cad yongs 
14a4(sngags): su gyur pa las/ dpal ldan rig po chen po sku mdog sngon po// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri dang gri gug phyag g.yon na rtse gsum dang thod pa'o// thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang
14a5(sngags): ba/ klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ mi'i mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ 'jigs par mdzad pa/ dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa/ zhal mche ba rnam par 
14a6(sngags): gtsigs pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan can/ sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung gis nyi ma la gnas pa nyid kyis rdzogs pa'i nag po chen po bsam nas/ snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM yig gi
14a7(sngags): 'od zer gyis/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs/ dam tshig sems dpa' dang lhan cig ro cig par bsam par bya ste/ yang dag par mchod cing dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya bas so// slar
14a8(sngags): yang de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs/ mAM ma kI la sogs pa de rnams kyis bdud rtsis dbang bskur bar bsam par bya'o// de'i rjes su rang ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi 'od zer las 
14b1(sngags): spros pa'i spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis mchod pa dang bstod pa yang bya'o// de nas de la bdud rtsi lnga dang / gtor ma dang / mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// de la 'bul ba'i sngags 
14b2(sngags): ni 'di'o// na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAk+Sh+mI dz+nyA badz+ra d+hI/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA yaM mad+hA daMSh+TAn+ta Ta b+hai rA wA ya a si mu Sha la par shrA pA shagr-i hI tatAstA ya oM Umr-i ta krAN+Da li kha ga d+hA rti khA ni tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ban+d+ha ban+d+he han 
14b3(sngags): han da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa gardza gardza bi s+pho Ta ya bau s+pho Ta ya sar+b+ba big+h+na bai nA ya kaM ga Na pa ti dzI bi tIn+ta kA rA ya hUM/ na maHsa man+ta k+Sha ya wA k+ShiSh+Na badz+ra NI au AHhUM/ oM me maM he haM kaM kai re ra ra ra mau hA mi hA kA 
14b4(sngags): yaM sin+ta N+Do ke sha war+thA Ne i ma ba laM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NA pa ya grId+d+hapA ya oM IHhUM sar+b+ba big+h+na bi nI pa kaM a~M a kA re mu khaM sar+b+ba d+harmAd+hAm+b+ha d+ha nuSh+maR+Sha dz+nyAt+ta e AHhUM phaT swAhA/ gtor ma byin te yang dag par 
14b5(sngags): mchod nas sngags bzlas par bya'o// de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM AHmaM haM ri hUM phaT swA hA/ yang dag par mchod cing bstod nas gshegs su gsol lo// zhes bya ba nag po chen po 
14b6(sngags): phyag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon klu sgrub zhabs kyis mdzad pa 'di rdzogaso// dngos grub brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po nags kyi rin chen gyi spyan sngar bsgyur ba'o// / 
14b7(sngags): ye shes mgon po gri gug can gyi bdag bskyed bzlas pa bstod pa rnams bzhugs// bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal mgon po sgrub par 'dod pas/ gnas yid 
14b8(sngags): dang mthun par stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ skyabs 'gro sems bskyed sngon du btang la/ pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du mi ro bkan pa cig bsam/ de'i steng du rang nyid skad cig 
15a1(sngags): gis dpal mgon po sku mdog mthing nagazhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas gri gug dang g.yon thod pa khrag gis gang ba bsnams pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ 
15a2(sngags): dbu skra dmar ser gyen du langs pa/ mi mgo skam po lngas dbu brkun pa/ rlon pa lnga bcu'i do shal byas pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs can/ zhabs g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang ba/ me'i 
15a3(sngags): klong dkyil na bzhugs par bsam mo// de'i thugs kar raM las nyi ma'i steng du hUM mthir nag bsam/ de las 'od zer 'phros pas shar phyogs nas rgyal ba mi bskyod pa spyan drangs la dbu'i 
15a4(sngags): gtsug na bzhugs/ des mgon po 'khu ldog mi 'byung ba yin gsung / yang 'od zer dmar smug 'phros pas/ gdug pa can thams cad kyi sems des bsregs par bsam/ hUM de'i mthar 
15a5(sngags): oM mahA kA la ha na ha na badz+ra na hUM phaT/ ces pa sa g.yas skor du 'khor bar dmigs la/ bsnyen pa 'bum tsho bcu bskyal/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba ga dab/ bzod par gsol/ dge ba bsngo/ 
15a6(sngags): 'bum tsho bcu gsum bskyal na snying gdon las thar pa yin gsung / dpal mgon po'i bzlas lung la brten pa'i mngon rtogs bla ma'i zhal las byon pa bzhin bris pa'o// rtags ni/ phyi dang
15a7(sngags): nang dang mi 'grub dang // ldog rtags lnga ru shes par bya// tshub shugs drag khang thog 'tsheg/ glu len bya nag a tsa ra// dar nag thogs dang 'o dod 'bod// phyi'i rtags su shes par bya// 
15a8(sngags): slob dpon 'ongs nas gtam smra dang // chos 'chad lung ston gdugs 'bul dang // ban+d+ha ston pa nang gi rtags// mgon po'i sku ston gri gug dang // mkha' 'gro tshogs dang ca co 'don// 
15b1(sngags): dngos grub ster bar thib dang // stag dang seng ge 'byong ba dang // shel gyi mchod rten bskor ba dang // gtor chen khyer 'phrad 'grub pa'i rtags// mtshon cha'i char dang a tsa ra/ 
15b2(sngags): 'khrug rgol khro du zlog rtags so// jo bo rjes mdzad pa lags/ yang skabs su 'di ltar byed do// oM ma hA kA la hA na hA na badz+ra tsa bdag la bsrungs shig srungs shig d+hU phaT sUt+ma/ zhes bdag gi zhal nas 
15b3(sngags): mgon po'i zhal du zhugs/ mgon po'i lte ba nas byung nas bdag gi lte bar zhugs te 'khor lo 'khor ba'i tshul du phar la nyon mongs pa dang / rnam rtog dang / nang dang / gdon la sogs pa'i gnod 
15b4(sngags): pathams cad mthon zhing / tshur la byin brlabs dang dngos grub 'byung bar bsam shing / brgya'am skyong ngam grub tshad bzlas/ gzhan yang / oM ma hA kA la ha na ta na badz+ra na ba dag la gnod par 
15b5(sngags): byed pa'i rgyal 'gong mar ya dza dza hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA la ha na ha na badz+ra na ba su puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ bdag gi 'byor pa puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ 'byor pa snga dro/ dgra bgegs 'dul na phyi dro gsung / oM ma hA 
15b6(sngags): kA la b+ha li hU ril rbad bu ni dza/ mang+ga kA la thag shad sid+d+hi ya ma du ti dza/ gling byin tshal/ snying nal tshal/ dgra bo 'di ma ra ya dza dza/ log rtags byung na brgya rtsa tsam gsungs/ sngags kyi phreng ba 
15b7(sngags): 'di rnams kyang jo bos mdzad/ hUM srin po'i gzugs kyi gdug pa can/ tshar gcod byang chub sems dpa' ste// grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jigs byed pa'i// gdum po khyod la bdag bstod 
15b8(sngags): do// hUM 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// bstan pa srung bar zhal bzhes pa'i// nag po khyod ni yin pa ste// gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbu skra kham nag gyen brdzes 
16a1(sngags): pas// steng gi lha tshegs 'jigs par byed// spyan bgrang ljags 'dril mche gtsigs pas// bar gyi lha tshogs brdegs par byed// g.yas na gri gug 
16a2(sngags): bsnams pa ni// dgra bgegs 'dul zhing bdud mgo gcod// g.yon da thod pa bsnams pa ni// gnod sems can gyi rkang khrag gsol// khros pas zhabs gnyis brdabs pa 
16a3(sngags): yis// gnod sems can gyi lus la gnyed// gang gi dkon mchog gsum gnod dang // bstan pa la gnod mtshams med byed// bdag gis bsgo ba kun khug la// ling+ga 'di/ 
16a4(sngags): la myur du khug/ 'di yi sha zo khrag la rol// rus paklad pa nang khrol drangs// rigs brgyud rtsad nas chod la shog/ mdza' bo kun dang khrol la shog/ yang na 'di

16a6(sngags): \u0f7f/ bai shwem+b+he dzas+tha sUR+Ye sA Ti ti ki ra Na hU bI dza b+hU badz+ra kA yaM/ daMSh+TaM b+h+re rbim+ba pI Te bi kr-i ta b+ha ya ka rA s+yo gra ro Shen+na rA dza/ saM b+hA sa b+h+yAM a rI Na tra sa ya b+ha ya ka ra kar+t+ti kAM pAM la d+hA raM/ bin+de A 
16a7(sngags): dgas shi da rdzogs pa las thang pa ma// sdig par dpa dam par byu shing mthab ga gapa kran 'jigs ga na dum pa kyai'o// brangs zhi pang dgas pa gapan pa'i phyagags kyi grag dang med pa 'a nga 'dzin byed pa// ga 
16b1(sngags): r+thapA daM dr-i b+hu ba na ku ma ti ni gra hi d+har+m+ma drA nau/ nr-i gr-ISh+To b+hU Shi trId+ga tri b+hA ba na bai/ Sha d+hA lo/ d+hAr+m+maSh+Ta d+hA ri/ as+t+raM laMd+hA ra ad+be dr-i b+hA ba na a pad dzA te mr-id+YA dza d+hI r-i/ kat+k+r-i kAM pI la na 
16b2(sngags): nabs kyi grong na 'a gsum nges par 'dzin cing chos sbyin mdzad la rtag du rab btud 'byed/ 'dig rten chos brgyad mo dos gsum dug sbyin du brgyad nams kyi yan la garnams pa rgyan par 'i dzi na// srid pa gsum gyi 'gro ba'i spyi dang 'chi ba las rgyal rus pa'i rgyan gyis dbu dang phyeg zhabs sdes// sa gsum skyon gyi tshigs rnams logs/ 
16b3(sngags): ba sa kya sa cad pa the tha ba deng ni thar 'ganye bar bsnams/ yang ming lnga le gags pas thams dpa' cid ma bya ba'i skang la grus pas phyag 'bye'o// ba ta rigs kyi pa rab pan pa ba gnas mdzang su ni mang smin ta bangar gnas/ zlan btsur byi 'tho ba nal chos kyi snang bar bathags la 
16b4(sngags): shisar+b+ba dzAd+ha mr-i k+Shi ts+yai/ oM ts+li ba rgya la 'i thang gtis suni rjesri tho y-i/ ma la ga rnaM pagam kyi srin rje l-Im thon+do/ hU~M hU~M hU~M ba~Mdza dI bi par ni to na hU~M sa tham na 
17a1(sngags): k+ShAb+h+rU~MdzaSh+Ta kro n+de zabacu no ni te rmAHbI d+hAr+m+ma tra~Mb+h+rU~M duSh+Ta mA~Md+hU paM badz+ra n+d+har bA sha~M oMn+d+ra mAm+b+ha ba~MSh+TA/ b+h+rU~MSh+Thasha~M d+d+ha kA~M ya~M ga la gis mi ga la tan mdun+da daMm+b+ha/ d+hI hrIT+Tag+hu 
17a2(sngags): pa sem sa zur 'a 'i rigs ma zin// 'ad pa cig gdug pa ga pa'ig 'thung la dang cun phreng bas yin pa gnapa brgyan pa// na da 'i gas mamapa 'ad pa nga yid sa du min 
17a3(sngags): shI kra ma ti ku du sha la kA ya bAk+tsiSh+Na pI Ta/ mo mo mo kal+la than+ti~M ku ki ka ha ma nas ni gra ha~M sarba dr-iSh+NI/ kAM kA kA kr-iSh+Thabar+N+Na mu d+ha bi ma ti ma na mA ra pa Sha bi nA sha/ kaM ka~M kaM mA ra b+h+rUM ba mtha 
17a4(sngags): ga na ya mtho sang ba de phreng de 'bye pa ga mas pa' ba te ma ya sa mas da 'a de da/ ma pa nan na ci / dpa napa na na da tham

17b4(sngags): ma ni sug ti btsan d+he rbar+tha A h+ye la ba~M d+hi/ dza~M dza rje ba sha rIn par ti ti bi hi ti dzag dz+nyA na mAM la~M/ nas dI ni ho ma hA kA sa a ra ta pa ma rnon rna ma ba dz+ra be th+ya/ mi d+hu gi po man 
18a1(sngags): bya// sad de ba gshenas mi gsang sa ye na pa med ga ma sagang dag pargal pa kyi gyud bad pa yas pa 'i sa lan tsamam pa cag tsog theg na ba da sa gapa grang nams ca sa banya pa 'gas ma 'das 
18a2(sngags): b+h+ya a ri a ti ta lit+sa ra ka mau d+ha ke b+h+yaH/ dai b+h+r-i yaM Sharba d+hA d+h+waMb+ha ti g+hA ma na tiHdr-iSh+Ta n+yA kA d+ya kar+m+maH/ shAn+taM praSh+TAM tsarak+ShaM sha rA da sha di shi na d+h+r-i ku d+hu saMn+nak+tA laM/ br-idz+dzinAM d+hAr+m+ma pI laM

18a5(sngags): da raHte bIr+Ya At+maH/ d+hAr+thaM di b+h+yo na tsin+d+haM pa ra d+hi ta yan s+t+waM sarba saM tAM trab+dzany+tsau/ yaMd+h+waM N+yai ta na laM b+h+rUM bi bidz+dza hI ta su She dz+nyA na taMShAM ma yAMH/ saMd+d+ha sheSh+TaM tri lo kaM ti ta sa? 
18b1(sngags): tra~M su la~M b+h+rUM sa d+hA smr-iha~M/ tri b+hA dza mahA kA la b+h+yo dza sa mA prA mi ti/ kr-i ti rI yaM shrI mang+ga d+harmA di t+yA s+thA ber pA dA nA mi ti/ de ye d+hA moM ye pra ba ra mad+hA yA na yA yi na ma ma mA ta pi traM pUr+b+banams 
18b2(sngags): ga gas pa zur cig/ ga chen po cag gnyis pa'i bstod pa rdzogs so// sa pa na gnas dpa'i shi dis cos kyi nyid byed napas kyi byung bas// tsun par byab mas 'dir ba mchog theg pachen pa rgyal la gnas pa bdag ga ri ma mi gas sa 
18b3(sngags): ka la sa tra rA shi ra nut+tA rA yAM sar+b+bak+saM bo dz+nyo pha la prAp+tA ye ta// dpal sa skya lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong rig sngags 'chang 'jam dbyangs kun dga' bsod nams grags pa

18b5(sngags): rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ me mkha' rgya mtsho lo dag pa'i gzhir bzhag nas lo zug cu bskor brgyad dang zhag ma nyi shu bsre ba kun 'dul ces bya ba me mo phag gi lo nag pa zla ba'i ches gcig 
18b6(sngags): gi nyin/ mkhan chen chos kyi rje bsod nams lhun grub len pa'i 'byung gnas rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i bkas gnang ba bzhin/ dpalas skya bzhi thog tu dag lnga bsgyur ba'o// rgyu skad ma dag phrad dung cung zad dpyad pa ba rgyams 
19a1(sngags): mgon po tha skad kyi dbang bzhugs so// dpal khrag 'thung rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// nag po chen po'i dbang bsdus pa'i lag len byed par 'dod pas/ khang pa phyag 
19a2(sngags): dar legs par byas la mchod pa lnga bsham gtor ma ni/ dang po yid dam dang nag po chen po ye shes pa la bsngo/ gnyis pa dpal can srog bdud 'khor bcas la/ gsum pa chos skyong spyi la/ bzhi 
19a3(sngags): pa dkar gtor tsog/ rigs drug na gnas pa rnams la bsngo/ ka pA la cig tu chang la bdud rtsi/ a mri ta sbyar la bzhag/ tshil chen gyi mar me/ sha chen gyi spos dud/ gu gul gyi dud pa/ spyan gzigs 
19a4(sngags): sna tshogs/ tshogs mchod sna tshogs mdun du bzhag pa ni/ rdzas bsham pa'o// de nas rang yid dam du gsal ba'i thugs ka nas sa bon las 'od 'phros/ dpal nag po chen po yab yum 
19a5(sngags): lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba spyan drangs te/ mgon po'i shar du pu tra mo/ lhor ka ri ma/ nub du re'u tri maM/ byang du las byed ma/ nub byang rtswa u tri/ byang shwar pe ta li'o// sprul pa 
19a6(sngags): mon po bdun/ mon mo bdun/ yang sbrul khyi mo drug/ lho phyogs gshin rje brgyad/ byang gnod sbyin brgyad/ bdud dang srin po la sogs pa rang rang gi kha dog dang 'thun pa/ 
19a7(sngags): gdan pad nyi dang / srin po/ 'byung po/ ro langs la sogs pa'i steng du/ zhabs brkyang bsku mgar gyi tshul du bskyed/ mchod gtor phul la ma nyes 
19a8(sngags): par bsam/ de nas bdag gi slob ma 'di rnams la mgon pos dbang bskur du gsol/ zhes gsol ba lan gsum gdab/ de nas rigs drug dang / gzhug 
19b1(sngags): mar gnas pa'i gtor ma 'byung gtor bzhin dbul/ yi dam dang ye shes pa la gtor ma dbul/ nag po chen po srog bdud 'khor bcas la/ 'di rang gi byin rlabs rgyas bsdus 
19b2(sngags): gang rung gis phul/ bstod bskul bya/ 'phrin las gzhol lo// mgon gtor ma da bang gi don du bzhag/ chos skyong spyi'i gtor ma btang / yig brgya grub ched gcig bzlas 
19b3(sngags): de nas slob dpon gyi sa yi dam gyi snying po dang / oM ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ oM sarba bud d+ha d+ha kri ni sha ri hUM dzaHces pa stong phrag cig bzlas so/ de nas slob mas bla ma la phyag dang yon/ 
19b4(sngags): dang maN+Dal phul la gsol ba gdab pa ni/ rje btsun rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso// bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi// dri ma ma lus dag bya'i phyir// ma smin smin pa'i dbang rnams 
19b5(sngags): brtsol/ zhes gsol ba lan gsum gdab/ bla mas gnang ba bya ste/ nga ni sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo yin/ nga ni khrag 'thung kun gyi rje// nga ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gtso// khyed la 
19b6(sngags): nga'i mthu sbyin zhing // byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ro// cesangs dbang sbyin gyis bsgrubs cig gsung bar bsam mo// de nas skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dbog ste/ 
19b7(sngags): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ste// zla med dkon mchog gsum po dang // bla ma yi dam lha tshogs dang // bde gshegs rnams la skyabs su mchi// ces lan gsum brjod do// 
19b8(sngags): de nas/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad cing // byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gos sems bskyed do// tshad med pa ba 
20a1(sngags): don sgom/ de nas thod pa bdud rtsi dang bcas pa slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la/ dpon slob gnyis kas mdun gyi nam mkha' la/ srog bdud yab yum la lha mo 
20a2(sngags): bdun dang / sprul pa mon mo bdun/ yang sgrol gyi mo drug/ sbas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor bar bsams la gsol ba gsum gdab/ 'di skad brjod/ dus gsum 
20a3(sngags): sangs rgyas spyan lam du// mo saM gus dad pas 'dud pa la// sku'i rang bzhin sbyin par byed// 'gyur med nag pos dbang bskur zhing // ngar 'joms byed pa dug 'dra 
20a4(sngags): ba'i// zil gnon seng ge lpags pa'i gos// mi 'gyur g.yung drung mun pa'i gos// gsod byed drag mo dbang gi gos// mgon po'i gos kyis dbang bskur ro// ces mgo 
20a5(sngags): thog du bzhag/ yang gong gi gsol ba lan gsum gad ba// gsung gi dbang bzhi dag la bskur ro// gzhad pa ha ha gang mo'i dbang // khros pa dza la phaT kyi dbang / 
20a6(sngags): zhi mdzad swAhA sbyor ba'i dbang // bsdud pa hUM mdzad po ga dbyung // bshugs pa'i bod pa ban+d+ha'i dbang // bod rbad rnams bzhis dbang bskur ro// yang lan gsum gdab/ 
20a7(sngags): thugs kyi dbang bzhi sems la bskur// nyon mongs zil gnon bdag med dbang // sdug bsngal gdung 'dren snying rje'i dbang // sred med sbyor ba gnyis med dbang // 
20a8(sngags): 'bras bu rang chas 'gro don dbang // 'gro don dgongs pa'i dbang bskur ro// yon tan 'phrin las nges pa'i dbang bsrur sbyin// rang don longs spyod rdzogs pa'i yon tan gshed 
20b1(sngags): gzhan don dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i yon tan gter// 'bras bu 'phrin las nges par dbang bskur ro// zhi mdzad zhi ba'i 'phrin las dang // rgyas mdzad rgyas pa'i 'phrin las dang // / 
20b2(sngags): dbang sdud dbang gi 'phrin las dang // mngon spyod drag po'i 'phrin las bzhi// las bzhi mdzad pa'i dbang bskur ro// zhes brjod pas/ rang yi dam lha dang nag po chen 
20b3(sngags): po'i thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas// rang bzhin gyi gnas nas nag po 'khor bcas spyan drangs te/ bar snang gi de ma tshig pa la bstim la// dpal nag po chen po 'khor bcas 
20b4(sngags): kyi phyag na// rin po che'i bum pa ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang ba thogs te/ slob ma'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur te/ smin mtshams yan gang bas bum pa'i dbang thob/ lus kyi dri 
20b5(sngags): ma dag par bsam/ mgrin pa yan chad gang bas gsang ba'i dbang thob/ ngag gi dri ma dag/ snying g.yan chad gang bas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob/ sems kyi dri ma dag/ 
20b6(sngags): lte ba nas gsang gnas yan chad gang bas dbang bzhi pa thob/ lus ngag yid gsum tha dad du 'dzin pa'i dri ma dag/ sku gsum gyi don thob par gnyis kas bsam mo// dngos 
20b7(sngags): su slob dpon gyis sngar gyi thod pa'i bdud rtsi de mgo thog tu blugs te khrus byas 'thung du bcug pas/ lus sems thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyis gang bar bsam zhing 
20b8(sngags): rdzogs drag bu bzlas te/ sarba thAg ta rA na badz+ra sadze badz+ra badz+ra baiH/ oM b+hi Sho& kr-in+tu/ oM AHtrAr+thahrIHswA hA/ sarba ba thA ga ta dA na badz+ra sarba bud+d+ha badz+ra paT a b+hi 
21a1(sngags): maM hUM/ oM AHhUM dr-i hrI swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra sarba rad+ha badz+ra phaT/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM hUM/ oM AHhUM traM hri swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na 
21a2(sngags): badz+ra sarba pad+ma badz+ra phaT/ oM b+hiShiny+tsa la~M tAM/ oM AHt+ma tra~M pA~Mm+b+hat+ma/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra sarba karma badz+ra phaT/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM hUM/ oM AHhUM tra~M wI swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra sarba 
21a3(sngags): pa ba shan+ti ku ru ye swA hA/ a b+hi Shiny+tsA ma ny+dzu.oM AHhUM traM hrI swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra sarba puSh+TiM ku ru ye swA hA/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mo hUM/ oM AHhUM traM hrI swA hA/ sarba ta thA 
21a4(sngags): gta dz+nyA na~M badz+ra sarba pi sha ku ru swA hA/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maMn+mu/ oM IHhUM tr-ih+ni sAhA/ sarbe ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra sarba mA ra ya n+d+ra dzAHa b+hi Shiny+tsa ma hUM/ oM a hUM tre b+h+rUM swA hA 
21a5(sngags): sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang yang bskur// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// de tshe las kyi gnyer dag btad// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar mdzod// ces rjes gnang 
21a6(sngags): sbyin/ las kyi gnyer gtad lung bstan par byas te bkra shis brjod do// bla ma rgyud pa'i mtshan brjod/ bden pa brdar/ de nas nag po chen po yab yum 'khor dang bcas pas// 
21a7(sngags): kaM pA la sha khrag gis bkang ba bzung nas/ slob ma'i mgo thog tu bzhag te/ bod rba dag/ de gsum dang gtor sngags ring po di ri ri bzlos shing / khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan 
21a8(sngags): babasrungs cig zer bar dpon slob gnyis kas bsams la/ dngos su gong gi gtor ma de mthog tu bzhag la/ srog thigs la sogs pa'i sngags dang gtor sngags ring po brjod pa 
21b1(sngags): tsam gyis/ lha ma srin sde brgyad bran du 'khol/ srid gsum zil gyis gnon cing / nag po chen pos gzi brjid mi thub pa'i lha 'jigs byed dam yi dam gang byed cig tu dpon slob 
21b2(sngags): gnyis kas bsgom mo// 'di ni mgon po'i gtor ma la brten nas 'phrin las kyi dab bskur ba yin no// de nas gtor ma gcan zan yod par btang / yi ge brgya pas lhag chad 
21b3(sngags): kha bskang / dbang bskur gyi lha rnams rang bzhin gyi gnas su gshegs so// de nas bla ma la yon phul la phyag dang bskor ba bya'o// de ltar dbang rnam pa bzhi sku gsum 'phrin 
21b4(sngags): las dang / gtor dbang dang bcus/ srog bdud nag po'i dbang bsdus pa rin po che rgyas pa zhes bya ba slob dpon b+ha li na a tsar+yas mdzad pa rdzogs so// slob dpon rdo rje 
21b5(sngags): dril bu bas mdzad pa'i rgyas pa cig dang bzhugs skad// mang+ga laM// @#// dpal nag po chen pa'i las tshogs paN+Di ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa// 
21b6(sngags): thugs rje'i bdag nyid lhag pa'i lha// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rdo rje can// lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa la// lus ngag yid gsum gus phyag 'tshal// rdo rje nag po chen po 
21b7(sngags): ye// bsten pa sngon du song ba yis// gdug can rnams tshar bcad pa'i// drag po las kyi rim pa bshad// gang zhig bstan pa 'jig pa dang // bla ma la ni rgyab phyogs 
21b8(sngags): shing // sems can du mi 'tshe byed pa// de la brtsam gyis gzhan du min// de la sngags pas srub bya bsad par 'dod na// de'i rim pa 'di yin te/ dang po li ga bya ba ni 
22a1(sngags): chu' grams dang shing gcig pa// thog mkhar tsha sgo can gyis// gang la dmigs pa'i bshang gAci dang // mtshan ngan thod par bsres pa las// sgrub bya 
22a2(sngags): gzugs ni sor brgyad pa'i// snying khar drug khrag dur sa la rnams// sbya bas bris pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi// snying khar sngags dang gang dmigs med // bskul tshag mtha' rten 
22a3(sngags): can thos bzhug/ de nas mtshan ngan thod pa yi// nang bzhug me shi'i sgra yis bcing // grugasum dkyil 'khor steng bzhag ste// rang nyid lho phyogs kha bltas nas// lha yirnal 'byor 
22a4(sngags): byas pa yis// snying kha'i sa bon las 'phros pa'i// mgon po'i tshogs ni dpag med pa// mdog dmar zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// lcags kyu zhags pa 'dzin pa yis// sgrub bya 
22a5(sngags): bkug nas mdun gnas par// bsams te kha sbyar phye ba dang // bstim nas gnyis su med par lta// de nas bzlas pa brtsam pa ni// oM badz+ra mahA kA la che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ 
22a6(sngags): zhes bzlas sngags kyi yig 'bru rnams// rang gi kha nas 'thon pa dang // bsam mi khyab pa'i mgon po'i tshogs// mdog nagazhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// sna tshogs mtshon cha 
22a7(sngags): 'dzin pa yis// sgrub bya rnam par 'bigs pa dang // gcod dang gdub pas phung po ni// til 'bru'i tshad tsam bye mar sgom// de ltar sgom dang bzlas pa ni// bdun 
22a8(sngags): gsum par bya rdzogs pa dang // gzugs brnyan phyung ste gtubs pa dang // dug gi chu la spags pa yis// tsher ma can gyi shing me la// gsang sngags bzlas shing sreg par bya// 
22b1(sngags): des ni sgrub bya tshangs pa dang // dbang po yin yang nges par ni// tshe yi 'du byed 'jig pa la// the tshom yod pa ma yin no// rdo rje nag pa chen po'i las bsad pa'i mnang ga rdzogs so// 
22b2(sngags): rdo nag pa chen po'i las bskrad pa'i mngon spyod zhes bya ba bzhugs so// gal te rnal 'byor pas bsgrub bya gnas nas bskrad par 'dod na/ de yi rim pa 'di yin te/ dang po 'khrul 
22b3(sngags): 'khor bri ba las// gzhi ni rlung gis phab pa yi// shing lo bar snang nas blangs te// dug khrag dur khrod sol ba rnams// mi shis thod pa'i snod du sbyar// rab tu ltogs pa'i sgo 
22b4(sngags): rtsa yis// 'khor lo rtsibs drug lteb dang // bcas pa bris te rtsibs rnams la// sngags drug dgod bya lta dbus paT// de mthar sgrub bya'i ming dang ni// ur+dz+nyA Ta ye spel tshig la/ 
22b5(sngags): paT kyi mthar brten sbyar ba bri// de nas mtshan ngan thod pa la// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bris pa yi// nang du bzhag ste rnal 'byor pa// lho bltas lha yi rnal 'byor du// gnas pa'i mdun 
22b6(sngags): du nag po che// bskyed la ye shes dgug la sogs// byas te mchod pa gtor ma dang // bstod pas mnyes par byas pa dang // phrin las sgrub zhes gsol ba ni// bstan la 
22b7(sngags): sdang ba'i gdug pa can// che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di// bkug cing dbang du bsdu ba dang // gnas gzhan rnams su bskrad du gsol// zhes brjod nas ni sngags bzlas shing // oM badz+ra/ 
22b8(sngags): ma hA kA la che ge mo dzaHdzaHhUM baM hoHzhes pa ngag tu bzlas pa'i tshe// mdun na gnas pa'i mgon po las// sprul pa dpag med spros pa ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mdog dmar ba// 
23a1(sngags): / lcags kyu zhags pa 'dzin pa yis// snying phrag mgrin pa bcings pa dang // bkug nas bstim pa gnyis med lta// de nas bskrad pa'i gsang sngags ni/ 
23a2(sngags): oM ma hA kA la che ge mo uts+tsha tra ya hUM phaT/ ces bzlas pa dang ting 'dzin ni// mdun gnas mgon po las sprul pa'i// khro bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// lag na sna tshogs mtshon 
23a3(sngags): thogs nas// bsdigs mo'i phyag rgya byed pa des// che ge mo 'di yul gzhan du// da lta nyid du mi 'gro na// rgyob sod rnam par 'bigs pa dang // dum bur byed ces zer ba 
23a4(sngags): yis// sgrub bya rnam par bcos nas su// rang gi gnas nas skrod pa dang // 'og nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // khro bo'i tshogs kyi lus las kyang // rlung gi rang bzhin 'od 
23a5(sngags): 'phros pas// bteg cing rgyab nas 'phul ba dang // skad cig tsam yang ma thogs par// gnas gzhan dag tu khyer bar bsam// de ltar sgom dang bzlas pa ni// stong phrag bdun 
23a6(sngags): bya rdzogs pa dang // 'khor lo rta 'am rnga mo yi// rnga mas bcings te bya rog gi/ mgul par bcings nas spur ba na// sgrub bya rang gi gnas de nas// gzhan du skrod par the tshom 
23a7(sngags): med// rdo rje nag po chen po'i las bskrad pa'i mngon spyod rdzogs so// @#// de rje nag po chen pa'i las dbye ba'i mngon skyed zhes bya ba bzhugs so// // gal te rnal 'byor pas sgrub/ 
23a8(sngags): bya phan tshun dbye bar 'dod na/ dang po 'khrul 'khor bri ba ni// rta dang ma he'i rus pa la// bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag gis su// sgrub bya gnyis kyi gzugs bris pa'i// snying khar sngags// 
23b1(sngags): dang sgrub bya'i ming // bskul tshig mtha' rten bcas pa bri// de nas thod pa mtshan ngan du// gzugs gnyis mgo mjug stsol ma// brtsegs nas bzhag cing bya rog dang // 
23b2(sngags): 'ug pa rta dang ma he yi// khrag dang 'jug ngogs phan tshun sa// sbyar ba'i phye ma bar du bzhug/ lho phyogs kha bltas rnal 'byor pas// rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du// gnas 
23b3(sngags): pa'i snying kha'i sa bon las// spros pa'i sprul pas sgrub bya gnyis// bkug ste rang ring gzugs la bstim// de nas dbye ba'i gsang sngags ni// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la che ge mo dang / 
23b4(sngags): chege mo bi dweSh+Ta ya hUM phaT/ ces bzlas de dus ting 'dzin ni// sgrub bya phan tshun 'tshang 'dru zhing // gcig gcig nyes pa sna tshogs brjod// gcig la gcig gis brdeg pa 
23b5(sngags): dang // phan chu ni zlas par byas pa yis// so sor gnas par bsam par bya// skam deng bzlas pa'i rim pa des// stong phrag bdun du sngags bzlas te// mthar ni 
23b6(sngags): gzugs brnyan gcig la gcig/ rgud pas phan tshun nyams byas nas// phye mar byas te chu ba li// dang bas 'byed par gdan ma za// rdo rje nag po chen po las dbye ba 
23b7(sngags): mdun snong rdzogs s+ho// mad+haya~M/ [] yi da pa du ts+tsha// sbrul te rnal 'byung bus sle ba bya'i lus rangs par byab 
23b8(sngags): 'dod no// dang po 'khrul 'khor bri ba ni// dur khrod pa la yung ba dang // dur phrad sol ba bsrem pa yis/ 
23b9(sngags): dbang chen dkyil 'khor bris pa yi// steng du sgrub bya'i ga 
24a1(sngags): bris te// snying khar sngags ming bskal tshig dang // mtha' dzin bcas pa thi bar bya// yan lag bzhi dang mag blta// laM yig ser po'i steng gnas 
24a2(sngags): pa'i// yig ljang khu bri bar bya// lte ba'i dbus su la ma ser dang // de steng gnas pa'i suM yig snang // la gnas d+hU yi ga nag pa ze// rang nyid ltar bltas mdun gyi cha/ 
24a3(sngags): 'khor lo maN+Dal snyed bzheg nas// sgrub po lha yi rnal 'byor du// gnas pa'i snying kha'i sa bon las// sprul pa spros pas bsgrub bya na// bkug nas gzugs la bstim pa dang / 
24a4(sngags): oM badz+ra mahA kA la hUM phaT/ laM che ge mo'i kA ya stam+b+ha ya laM// ces pa'i gsang sngags pazlas bya zhing // rengs byed ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas// bslab bya dbang chen steng gnas 
24a5(sngags): pa'i// lus gnas la yig yongs gyur pas// sprul pa'i dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi// steng du suM yig yongs gyur pa'i// ri bos rnam par mnan pa dang // lte bar ri bo 
24a6(sngags): la gnas pa'i// hUM gyur pa las rgya gram gyi// rdo rjes rnam par mnan pa ru// bsgoms shing stong phrag bdun bzlas na// sgrub bya'i lus ni rengs 'gyur bar// the tshom yod pa ma 
24a7(sngags): yin no// rdo rje nag po chen po'i las lus rengs par byed pa'i mngon spyod rdzogs so// 4/ @#// da chen pa mas pa/ dngas par byed pa'i tshong na spyad zhes ga// gal te rnal 'byor pas 
24a8(sngags): ngag rengs par bya bar 'dod na// dang por 'khrul 'khor bri ba ni// dur khrod ra sa la yung ba dang // ro so la sbyar ba'i snag cha yis// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// / 
24b1(sngags): sgrub bya'i gzugs bris de yi lce// phyir la drangs pas lto ba'i steng // khebs pa'i rnam pa can bris te// de'i steng laM yig ser po la// gnas pa'i su yig ljang khu yi/ 
24b2(sngags): steng du hUM yi ga nag pa la// laM yaMg ser po la gnas pa'o// suM yi gser bas bskor ba bri// sgrub bo rang nyid sgor bltas pa'o// mdun du maN+Dal steng bzhog ste// lho yi rnal 'byor/ 
24b3(sngags): laganas pa'i// snying kha'i sa bon las 'bros pa'i// sprul pa sgrub bya mdun bkug nas// gzugs la bstim pas gnyis med lta// de nas ngag rengs bya ba'i phyir// bzlas pa'i 
24b4(sngags): sngags ni 'di yin te// oM badz+ra mad+hA kA la nA phaT/ la cho ga ma'o ngag stam+b+ha ya laM/ zhes pa thas sgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin// dbang chen la gnas sgrub bya'i gzugs// dpag car/ 
24b5(sngags): bcu stong tshad tsam la// rang lus 'di 'phros las byung ba'o// khro bzhi la gcig phyag gnyis pa// lag na lcags kyu 'dzin pa yis// sbyin phyir la drangs pa dang // dpag tshad/ 
24b6(sngags): brgya yi tshad tsam gyis// lto ba'i steng rnams khebs par sgom// de steng sa la yig yongs gyur las// dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng gnas pa'i// su gyur pa las ri bo'i steng// 
24b7(sngags): hUM gyur rdo rjes mnan pa la// la gyur pa las dbang chen steng // gnas pa'i suM yig gyur pa las// grub pa'i gser gyi ri bdun gyis// bskor bas rnam par mnan par sgom// 
24b8(sngags): gzhan yang rang lus las sprul pa'i// khro bo'i tshogs ni dpag med kyis// srab bya'i lce yi steng gnas nas// mtshon chas dum bur byed pa dang // de dag 'dus las bskal 
25a1(sngags): / pA yaM// me bzhin cha ba'i 'od byung nas// bsregs par bsgoms pas stong phrag bdun// bzlas pas gdon ma za bar 'grub// rdorje dag pa chen po 'ang / 
25a2(sngags): dag ngas par byed pa'i myangan snang rdugs so// kA// gal rkyen ma 'byung pas ya rangs 
25a3(sngags): bar 'dud na// dang po 'phrul 'khor zig nA~M// rtswaR+sha bsan gzhing du sngag+sa ya~Ms// dbang chen la 'khor la gnas b+ta'aM// brgya'i gzugs ni bris pa yis// s+yA 
25a4(sngags): / ts+tsha/ gas / dang / nags sa la// mdzin pas/ 
25a5(sngags): man la 'byor la// gan sa pa'i la ban las skyes pa'o// skam pas ba krag nas bstim pA dang // yid rings byed byer gsang sngags ni// mamam par bzhag pas bzlas pan// 
25a6(sngags): rnams sa n+d+ha nas can ma sa m+b+ha ma T+Te/ zhes rdzogs pa thas dang nying 'dzin no// dbang chen kyil 'khang ste gnas pa'i// k+Shabar+b+ha ga tul gnas pa/

26a1(sngags): bsgom pa dang // sngags dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las// byung 'od me bzhin tsha ba yis// srab bya'i mngal skems par sgom zhing // gsang sngags

26a3(sngags): srid nyams par ni byed pa la// the tshom yod pa ma yin no// rdo rje nag po chen po'i las srid skem pa'i mngon brjod rdzogs so// ma 
26a4(sngags): rdo rje nag pa chen po'i las mngon spyod slar gso par byed pa zhi ba'i las zhes bya ba bzhugs so// gal te mngon spyod de rnams kyis// sgrub bya rnam par skrag gyur nas// sdig las yongs 
26a5(sngags): su ldog pa dang // sgrub pa po la gus byed na// slar yang zhi bar byed pa yi// phrin las sgrub pa pos brtsam pa// snga dro yi ni dus kyi char// gtsang ma'i ras sam dge ba yi//

26b3(sngags): mthar ni 'khor lo dri zhim chus// bkrus te sgrub bya'i lus bkrus pas// zhi bar byed par gdon me za// rdo rje nag po chen po'i las mngon sad+ma slar gso bar byed pazhi pa'i las rdzogs so/

26b8(sngags): phyag na dbyig pa spyi blugs can// bsgoms te khrag gi yon chab dang // til dang yungs nag las byung mar// dug dang ske tshe smyon pa yi// 'bras bu mi shis skra dang gos// 
27a1(sngags): dum bur byas nas kyi bag dang // bong bu'i rus pa lpags pa rnams// lag pa g.yon pas blangs pa dang // sngags 'di brjod la dbul bar bya// oM badz+ra 
27a2(sngags): ag+ne ye raM raM che ge mo ai mu kai tsU hUM phaT re raM/ de nas me lha mchod pa lnga// drag por sbyar bas mchod pa dang // 'bar chen me yi rang bzhin du// bltas pa'i dbus su nag po che/

44b2(sngags): bsang ba ni// bar snang rol lding ba'i bya rgod kr-i// sha za khrag la 'thung ba'i lce sbyang khri// pags glad rgyu ma 'khyer ba'i wa khyi khri// ro la lhur mid byed pa'i stag gzig khri// ro za ro gos gyon pa'i srin po khri// keng rus 
44b3(sngags): rjes la snom pa'i gzhad ki ri khri// skad dang dri la brgyug pa'i dri za khri// thag 'thung sha rus 'byed pa'i 'phar ba khri// nang khrol don snying za ba'i sbrul gdug khri// mdun bsu phyi la 'brang ba'i yi dgas gzugs can 
44b4(sngags): khri/ de ltar sha za 'bum gyi thugs dam bskang // bskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang // hUM thugs dam bskang ba'i dam rdzas ni// thams cad sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi dang // rak+ta dmar gyi an dang // sha khrag dkyil 
44b5(sngags): ba'i gtor ma dang // snang gsal 'od kyi zhun mar dang // sha chen spos kyi dud sprin dang // tshogs kyi zhal zas mang po dang // mgon lug nag po spyi dkar dang // bya mo nag mo gser mig dang // byi nang gsang ba'i 
44b6(sngags): dam rdzas kyis// chos skyong nag po 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang // bskoskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang // hA su yid ma rdzas yin pa'i byar// bya rgod mnga' yis thugs dam bskang // rak+Sha rnam gsum 
44b7(sngags): gsung gi rten// gsung gi rten gyis/ tsid+d+ha rnam gsum thugs kyi rten// thugs kyi rten gyis thugs dam bkang // g.yog lug nag po bya yirten// sde yi rten gyis thugs dam bskang // bya nag rgyal mtshan nang girten// 
44b8(sngags): nang na gyis thug pa das bdang // seM ni rdzing ma ni gsang ba'i rten// gsang ba'i rten gyi sa thugs das bkang // 'thod pa'i dmangs yin pa'i phyir// gal ba dang nag pas thugs dam bkang // dam 
45a1(sngags): gnyen po bsre ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi sman gyis thugs dam bskang // rak+ta zhal du gsol ba'i phyir// dmar chen argas thugs dam bskang // phrin las rnam bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir// su ra chang 
45a2(sngags): gis thugs dam bskang // rtag tu mi 'bral 'grogs pa'i phyir// rtag gtor chen pos thugs dam bskang // rgyun tu phrin las bcol ba'i phyir// rgyar gyi gtor mas thugs dam bskang // rbad pa'i dam rdzas yin pa'i 
45a3(sngags): phyir/ khyi nag snying gis thugs dam bskang // gsang ba'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// gri rgod snying gis thugs dam bskang // bsgral ba'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// lug nag snying gis thugs dam bskang // bskang 
45a4(sngags): ba'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// lug nag spyi dkar thugs dam bskang // dgyes pa'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// mkha' lding nag pos thugs dam bskang // nal bu'i sha khrag gtor chen 'dis// yum chen gsum gyis 
45a5(sngags): thugs dam bskang // bsad pa'i sha khrag snying sna 'dis// bya rog gdong can bzhi'i thugs dam bskang // tshogs phud sha sna 'bru chen 'dis// mkha' 'gro drug dang lha mo brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang // bshos 
45a6(sngags): bu dmar nag snying gis brgyan pa'i gtor ma 'dis// legs ldan seng ge gdong can la sogs pa'i// pho bdud nyi shu rtsa gcig thugs dam bskang // khrag sna sman sna sbyar ba'i gtor ma 'dis// mkha' 'gro sgrol byed 
45a7(sngags): la sogs pa'i// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad thugs dam bskang // dkar gsum sman gyis sbran pa'i gtor ma 'dis// gang po mdzes pa la sogs pa'i// dregs pa sum du'i thugs dam bskang // 'bru 
45a8(sngags): bcud bdud rtsis bkang ba'i gtor ma 'dis// legs ldan smyon pa la sogs pa'i// dpal mgon bdun cu rtsa gnyis thugs dam bskang // 'bru gsum dkar dmar brgyan pa'i gtor ma 'dis// ro langs 
45b1(sngags): las byed rnams kyi thugs dam bskang // nag po 'dun gyi sha zag spungs pa'i gtor ma 'das// nag po stong gi thugs dam bskang // sha khrag sna tshogs sbyar ba'i gtor ma 'dis// gnod sbyin 'byung po lnga 
45b2(sngags): thugs dam bskang // rak+ta bdud rtsi sman gyis sbran pa'i gtor ma 'dis// ma mo nag mo bye ba'i thugs dam bskang // lhag gtor kha chus sbran pa'i gtor ma 'dis// sprul pa sha za 'bum gyi thugs dam bskang // 
45b3(sngags): hU~M de ltar mgon po'i lha tshogs rnams// 'du ba'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// mi rkang gling bus thugs dam bskang // mams zas su za ba'i phyir// sha chen bdud rtsis thugs dam paskang // spyan gyi dbang po 
45b4(sngags): tsham mdzad pa'i// tshal chen ma dam sa thug sa rnam bskrad// shangs kyi dbang po ni ma mdzad pa'o// bsur chen dud pas zugs dam pashad// sngags kyi dbang ba tsham mdzad pa'i// bshas bu nying kyi 
45b5(sngags): mas thugs dam bskang // snyan gyi dbang po tshim mdzad pa'i// rnga dang dril bu cang te'us thugs dam bskang // mthun pa'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// gos nag zhwa nag dag gis thugs dam bskang // mchod 
45b6(sngags): pa'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// nya sha la phug sgog tsong la sogs thugs dam bskang // dgyes shing dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// tshogs dang gtor mas thugs dam bskad// g.yag lug nag po mar gyis byugs// 
45b7(sngags): dar nag ru mtshon rwa la brgyan// phrag par dgra bgegs ling+ga bskyon// gser skyems bdud rtsis bran pa 'dis// nag po chen po'i thugs dam bskang // zhes brjod la bshags pa bya ba ni// dpal ye shes kyi 
45b8(sngags): mgon po byi rog gi ming can la// sku gsung thugs kyi yum gsum dang // phrin las kyi mgon pi bya rog gdong can bzhis bskor ba// mkha' 'gro ma drug dang // lha mo brgyad dang // mgo brnyan bcu drug dang / phyag 
46a1(sngags): brnyan legs ldan seng ge gdong can la sogs pa pho bdud nyi shu rtsa gcig/ DA ki sbrel byed la sogs pa dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad// klu'i rgyal po gang po mdzes ma la sogs pa dregs pa can sum 
46a2(sngags): nu/ legs ldan nag po la sogs pa dpal mgon bdun cu rtsa gnyis// drag po smyon pa la sogs pa ro langs chen po brgya// mgyogs byed nag po la sogs pa nag po stong // dgra bo'i bla srog 'gugs par byed pa 
46a3(sngags): la sogs pa 'byung po gnod sbyin khri// gar byed nag me la sogs pa ma mo bye ba// khrung dang bya rgod sbrul la sogs pa sha za 'bum gyis bskor ba rnams kyi spyan sngar/ bdag gis bka' ltar mgyur te/ gzhung bzhin rdo mthogs 
46a4(sngags): pas/ bsnyen sgrub tshad du ma phyin par las la sbyar ba dang / tshogs dang phud gtor dus su ma grub pa dang / mchod pa'i 'byor tshogs chungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ma gsal bar bzlas pa kra chag pa dang / phye nang gsang ba'i rten 
46a5(sngags): rdzas ma tshogs par gsang ba bsgrags pa dang / sku gsung thugs dang phyi nang gsang ba'i dam tshig nyams pa thams cad mthol lo bshags so// dpal nag po chen po ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan pa/ khrag 'thung gi rgyal po//

46a7(sngags): spel cig/ dpal dang grags pa bsgrubs shig/ 'khor dang gang zag skyongs shig/ sdang ba'i dgra dang bar chad kyi rkyen rnams thul cig/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu bzlog cig/ nad rigs bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi zhi 
46a8(sngags): bar mdzod cig/ ltas ngan brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bsgyur cig/ ye 'brog sum brgya drug bcu bzlog cig/ lo'i keg dang zla ba'i keg dang zhag gi keg dang za ma'i keg dang bkra mi shis pa thams cad bzlog cig/ ces brjod 
46b1(sngags): par bya'o// yi ge brgya pa ci nus bzlas par bya'o// rnal 'byor pa rnams tshogs la longs spyod par bya'o// de nas smad las kyi drag po'i las sbyor yang bya'o// dpal mgon po bya rog ma'i bskangs kyi cho ga'i rim pa/ bla ma a b+ha
46b2(sngags): ya kA ras/ dpal nA len+d+ra'i gtsug lag khang du/ rdo sku rang byung gi rtsar mdzad pa'o// phyis bla ma chen po dpal rga los rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o// yad+na ge/ @#// dbu nig pa chen po'i dngos grub dang bsrung ba dang gazlog pa'i grub thabs zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 
46b3(sngags): rgya ga skad du/ shrI ma hA ke la sid+d+hi k+Shar+ya gi ra dza d+ha na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i dngos grub dang bsrung ba dang bzlog pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang dang man ngag/
